scripts.build: ng build brooke-domain && ng build brooke-server && ng build brooke-state && ng build brooke-components && ng build brooke && ng build brooke-storybook
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.watch:server: wait-on dist/brooke-domain/index.d.ts && ng build brooke-server --watch --configuration development
scripts.watch:state: wait-on dist/brooke-server/index.d.ts && ng build brooke-state --watch --configuration development
scripts.watch:components: wait-on dist/brooke-state/index.d.ts && ng build brooke-components --watch --configuration development
scripts.watch:brooke: npm run clean && run-p watch:libs serve:brooke
scripts.watch:brooke-storybook: npm run clean && run-p watch:libs serve:brooke-storybook
scripts.watch: npm run clean && run-p watch:libs serve:brooke serve:brooke-storybook
